body_html:
Is this OK to merge? I see the test timing out now.

Just a friendly reminder that, steady state, the conda installs should live in the docker image, and not be done in the test script. That will improve test times, especially when downloads are big.

Just a friendly reminder that, steady state, the conda installs should live in the docker image, and not be done in the test script. That will improve test times, especially when downloads are big.
